name: Halong Bay Overnight Junk Boat Cruise
description: Discover the coastal majesty of Halong Bay, one of Vietnam’s most captivating natural wonders, on a 2-day cruise from Hanoi. Climb aboard a traditional junk boat and set sail over the shimmering waters of the bay to see over a thousand limestone islands and mysterious caves. Delve into the darkened depths of the Cave of Surprises and plunge into the crystal clear waters of the ocean during swimming and kayaking stops. Enjoy an intimate ambience on this small-group tour, where numbers are limited to 24 people.
